TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NavigationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含支持导航的各种方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装了在浏览器样式的导航上下文内下载内容的功能。 encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation. 内容可以是任何类型的 .NET Framework 对象和 HTML 文件。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 但一般情况下，页面是为导航导航内容而首选的方式（请参阅 ）。In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see ). 可以通过提供对象的实例并调用接受对象的 方法的重载来导航内容：Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the method that accepts an object: - - 或者，通过将相对或绝对 URI 传递到接受 URI 的 方法重载之一，可以导航到内容：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute URI to one of the method overloads that accepts a URI: - - - 按 URI 导航到内容后， 将返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. 导航的生存期可通过以下事件进行跟踪：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 。. 并非每次发生导航时都会引发所有事件;引发的事件集由发生的导航类型（内容或内容片段）以及导航完成方式（取消、停止或失败）决定。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了引发这些事件的顺序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 导航期间或之后 提供有关要导航到的内容的信息，其中包括要导航到的内容的 URI （）、当前内容的 URI （）以及包含的内容的对象导航到（）。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 导航至内容时， 会将导航记录为导航历史记录中的条目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 当出现新的导航时，通过调用 方法，或者通过调用 导航到前进导航历史记录中的条目，可以将条目添加到后退导航历史记录中。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 通过导航到后退导航历史记录中的条目（通过调用 ），将条目添加到前进导航历史记录中。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和 报告后退和前进导航历史记录中是否分别存在条目。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 此外，可以通过调用 来删除后退导航历史记录中的最新条目。Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 默认情况下， 不会在导航历史记录中存储内容对象的实例。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，每次使用导航历史记录导航到内容对象时， 都将创建该对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免在将大量内容导航到时消耗过多的内存。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，不会从一个导航到下一个导航来记住内容的状态。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不过，WPF 提供了多种方法，通过这些方法，你可以在导航历史记录中存储一段内容的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用 ，还可以记住单个页面实例的多个状态集。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 是 `sealed` 类，因此不能进行实例化;相反，导航器使用 来启用导航。 is a `sealed` class and therefore cannot be instantiated; instead, is used by navigators to enable navigation. 在 WPF 中，有两个导航器： 和 。In WPF, there are two navigators: and . 直观地 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航器来提供集成的用户体验。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 然而，实际上 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 将 用作导航器;在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 中运行的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] 的 属性将返回对 的引用，并且由 管理的导航历史记录与通过以下方式由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 管理的导航历史记录相集成。:Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - 通过从 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] 中调用 、和 导航到内容时，还会将相关导航历史记录项添加到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航历史记录中。When content is navigated to by calling , , and from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history. - 选择 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 中的项时，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] 会使 向后导航到与这些项关联的内容。When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries. > [!NOTE] > 可以提供自己的导航历史记录，也可以使用托管它的导航器的导航历史记录。A can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it. 如果 提供其自己的导航历史记录，则可以在导航历史记录中的条目中显示其自己的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)];这些项不会添加到宿主导航器的导航历史记录（、、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]），因此，无法从每个项的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 中导航到它们（请参阅 ）。If provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (, , [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each (see ).

span.span: if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定后退导航历史记录中是否至少有一个条目。 to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history. 调用 之前应对此属性进行检查;如果调用 并且后退导航历史记录中没有任何条目，则会引发 。This property should be inspected before calling ; if is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果导航历史记录由多个导航器共享（、），则当前导航器的 可能未添加后退导航历史记录中的最新条目。that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (, ), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the for the current navigator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定前进导航历史记录中是否至少有一个条目。 to determine whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history. 调用 之前应对此属性进行检查;如果调用 且前进导航历史记录中没有任何条目，则会引发 。This property should be inspected before calling ; if is called and there are no entries in forward navigation history, an is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Content { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Content : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对包含当前内容的对象的引用。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.

value.span: 一个对象，它是对包含当前内容的对象的引用。

span.span: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一设置内容：Content can be set in one of two ways: - 直接将它设置为对对象的引用。Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object. - 通过调用 、或 ，间接调用。Indirectly, by calling , , or . 设置 会启动新导航;由于导航是异步的，因此如果在设置后立即检查， 不会返回值。Setting initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentSource As Uri
public: property Uri ^ CurrentSource { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次导航到的内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI of the content that was last navigated to.

value.span: 如果使用 URI 导航到，则为上次导航到的内容的 ;否则，。

span.span: A for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a URI; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在成功完成导航到不同的 URI 之前，不会更改 属性的值。The value of the property is not changed until navigation to a different URI has completed successfully. 可以使用只包含片段的 URI 设置 。 can be set with a fragment-only URI.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FragmentNavigation As FragmentNavigationEventHandler

summary.span: 当开始导航到某个内容片段时发生，如果所需片段位于当前内容中，它会立即发生；或者，如果所需片段位于不同内容中，它会在加载了源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 内容之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，内容片段是命名 包含的内容，该名称是设置 属性的 ，例如：By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named , which is a whose attribute is set, eg: ``` ... ``` 通过提供具有以下格式的后缀的 URI 导航到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 片段：You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a URI with a suffix in the following format: \#*FragmentName*\#*FragmentName* 下面显示了引用内容片段的 URI 示例：The following shows an example of a URI that refers to a content fragment: `http://www.microsoft.com/targetpage.xaml#FragmentName` 加载源页面后（引发 事件之后），片段导航开始， 尝试查找 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 片段。After the source page loads (after event is raised), fragment navigation begins and the attempts to locate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment. 如果找到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 片段，则 指示内容导航器（，）显示片段。If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment is found, instructs the content navigator (, ) to show the fragment. 如果需要更改此行为，您可以处理 以提供您自己的片段导航行为。If you need to change this behavior, you can handle to provide your own fragment navigation behavior. 向 传递了一个 参数，该参数将公开有助于此目的的属性，包括： is passed a parameter which exposes properties that are useful for this purpose, including: - 拥有此导航服务的导航器（、）。The navigator that owns this navigation service (, ). - 片段名称。The fragment name. 您可以处理 以通过您自己的自定义实现来重写默认的 WPF 片段实现。You can handle to override the default WPF fragment implementation with your own custom implementation. 如果这样做，则需要将 设置为 `true`;否则，将应用默认的 WPF 片断处理行为。If you do so, you need to set to `true`; otherwise, the default WPF fragment processing behavior is applied. 应避免直接从 事件处理程序中启动导航。You should avoid directly initiating navigation from within a event handler. 由于 是在现有导航期间引发的，因此从 事件处理程序启动新导航会创建一个嵌套的导航，从而导致 引发。Since is raised during an existing navigation, initiating a new navigation from a event handler creates a nested navigation that can cause the to be thrown. 相反，你可以通过使用 创建异步工作项来间接启动导航。Instead, you can indirectly initiate navigation by creating an asynchronous work item using the . > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在以下情况下，不支持片段导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 页面（带有 `Page` 作为根元素的仅标记 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 文件）：Fragment navigation is not supported for loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] pages (markup-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files with `Page` as the root element) in the following cases: > > •导航到松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 页面中的片段。• When navigating to a fragment in a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > •从松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 页面导航到另一个松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 页面中的片段。• When navigating from a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page to a fragment in another loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page. > > 但是，松 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 页面可以导航到其自己的片段。However, a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can navigate to its own fragments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 以提供自定义片段导航行为。The following example shows how to handle to provide custom fragment navigation behavior. 在这种情况下，如果找不到 "源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]" 页中的片段，该示例将 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 页打开错误。In this case, the example opens an error [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page if the fragment in the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page is not found. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowFragmentNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowfragmentnavigationcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航器具有处理内容导航的 。A navigator has a that handles content navigation. WPF 有两个导航器： 和 。WPF has two navigators: and . 为了处理导航请求和管理导航生存期，导航器使用 WPF 导航服务，该服务作为 类实现。To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the WPF navigation service, which is implemented as the class. 导航器承载的内容可以通过调用 方法来获取对导航器的 的引用。Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's by calling the method. `dependencyObject`时， 返回 `null`： returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - 是 。Is a . - ：Is a that: 1. 由另一导航器承载。Is hosted by another navigator. 2. 属性设置为 。Has its property set to . - 不是由导航器承载的内容的一部分。Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator. WPF 提供了两个快捷方式，用于获取对 的引用：WPF offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the : - 处理到 的导航的 可以通过获取其 属性的值从 本身进行访问。The that processed the navigation to a can be accessed from the itself by getting the value of its property. - 可以通过获取 属性的值来访问用于处理导航的 的 。The that is used by a to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过调用 来检索导航服务 。The following example shows how a can retrieve a navigation service by calling . [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/ContentUserControl.xaml.cs#getnavigationservicecode2)] [!code-vb[NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets#GetNavigationServiceCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGetNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/contentusercontrol.xaml.vb#getnavigationservicecode2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GoBack() cil managed

summary.span: 导航到后退导航历史记录中的最新条目（如果有）。

span.span: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 之前，可以检查 属性，以确定后退导航历史记录中是否存在条目。Before calling , the property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history. ## Examples 下面的示例导航到后退导航历史记录中的最新条目（如果有）。The following example navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if one exists. summary.span: 当已加载、分析并开始呈现目标导航内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要在加载完成时发现有关导航请求的相关信息，请处理 。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion. 此信息可从传递到 事件处理程序的 对象中获得，其中包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 内容及其 URI。The content and its URI. - 导航器（）。The navigator (, ). - 如果通过调用 或 启动导航，则为附加数据。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 响应详细信息（使用 对象）。Response details (using a object). 当未能找到或加载源页面时，不会引发 ，在这种情况下，会引发 。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowLoadCompletedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowloadcompletedcode)]

summary.span: 异步导航到指定的源内容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to the specified source content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下条件， 将导航到 `root` 指定的 ： will navigate to the specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - 事件未取消。The event is not cancelled. - 可以创建 web 请求（请参阅 ）。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果 `null``root`，则会清除现有内容（）。If `root` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 下载 Web 内容时，可能会收到 Web 异常（例如，404：找不到文件）。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 可以从 处理此类异常。You can handle such exceptions from . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到包含源内容树的 对象。The following example shows how to navigate to a object containing the source content tree. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateObjectCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigateobjectcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 对象。

span.span: A object initialized with the URI for the desired content.

summary.span: 异步导航到由 URI 指定的内容。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a URI.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source` 的值可以是 Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] 或有效的 pack URI （请参阅[WPF 中的 Pack uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)）。The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack URI (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)). 如果满足以下条件， 将导航到 `source` 指定的 URI： will navigate to the URI specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - 事件未取消。The event is not cancelled. - 可以创建 web 请求（请参阅 ）。A web request (see ) can be created. 如果 `null``source`，则会清除现有内容（）。If `source` is `null`, the existing content () is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 下载 Web 内容时，可能会收到 Web 异常（例如，404：找不到文件）。When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found). 可以从 处理此类异常。You can handle such exceptions from . 您可以使用 导航到内容片段。You can use to navigate to a content fragment. 如果由 URI 标识的内容是当前内容，则不会再次下载。If the content identified by the URI is the current content, it is not downloaded again. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到 URI。The following example shows how to navigate to a URI. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatecode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管传递对象而不是 URI，此方法与 具有相同的行为。This method has the same behavior as , although an object is passed instead of a URI. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到包含源内容并传递导航状态的 对象。The following example shows how to navigate to a object containing the source content, and passing navigation state. MemberSignature.Value: public bool Navigate (Uri source, object navigationState);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Navigate(class System.Uri source, object navigationState) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (source As Uri, navigationState As Object) As Boolean
public: bool Navigate(Uri ^ source, System::Object ^ navigationState);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 对象。

span.span: A object initialized with the URI for the desired content.

param.name: navigationState
param.span: 一个包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

summary.span: 异步导航到位于某个 URI 中的源内容，并传递一个对象，其中包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

span.span: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a URI, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于导航是异步的，因此可以同时在多个导航中进行。Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time. 例如，如果一个页面上有两个子框架，则可以导航两个框架。For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating. 在这种情况下，可能会多次引发 引发的各种导航事件，每个导航事件对应于要导航到的每个内容片段，而不必按顺序请求导航。In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested. 因此，如果特定导航请求需要处理特定于单个请求的数据，则它不能使用可用于所有导航请求的数据。Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests. 相反，你可以使用 `navigationState` 来传递数据，以进行特定于一个导航请求的导航处理。Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request. 以下事件参数提供对导航状态的访问权限：The following event arguments provide access to navigation state: - （传递到 事件）。 (passed to the event). - （传递到 、 事件处理程序）。 (passed to the , , event handlers). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了导航到 URI 和传递导航状态。The following example demonstrates navigating to a URI and passing navigation state. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets#MainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceNavigateUriStateSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowcode)]

The default is .

summary.span: 异步导航到位于某个 URI 中的源内容，传递一个对象（其中包含在导航过程中进行处理的导航状态），并沙盒处理内容。

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅适用于独立应用程序和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content. 此方法与 的行为相同，并通过确保正在下载的内容放入部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认的 Internet 区域权限集，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)）来扩展此方法。This method exhibits the same behavior as , and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigated As NavigatedEventHandler

summary.span: 找到导航的目标内容且可通过 属性得到这些内容时发生，即使尚未加载完毕也是如此。

span.span: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the property, although it may not have completed loading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要在下载时发现有关导航请求的相关信息，请处理 。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences. 此信息可从传递到 事件处理程序的 对象中获得，其中包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 源页。The source page. 如果 引发，则至少已分析源页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 树的一部分，并将其附加到目标内容控件。When is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control. - 请求的 URI。The requested URI. - 导航器（）。The navigator (, ). - 如果通过调用 或 启动导航，则为附加数据。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . - 响应详细信息（使用 对象）。Response details (using a object). 当未能找到或加载源页面时，不会引发 ，在这种情况下，会引发 。 is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigating As NavigatingCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 请求新导航时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求新导航时，但在请求源内容之前，将会引发 ，包括： is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when: - 调用 。 is called. - 调用 或 （或从导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]中选择一个条目）。 or is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]). - 导航到内容片段。A content fragment is navigated to. 如果需要在导航开始之前发现有关导航请求的相关信息，请处理 。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts. 传递到 事件处理程序的 对象中提供了此信息。This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler. 将从 参数创建并提供导航的 对象;由于此时尚未发出实际请求，因此可以根据需要重新配置 对象。A object for the navigation is created and available from the parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the object, if necessary. 如果需要，还可以通过将 设置为 true 来处理 取消导航。You also handle to cancel navigation, if required, by setting to true. 如果取消导航，则不会引发任何其他导航事件。If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的应用程序承载于浏览器中，则无法通过取消 事件阻止用户离开你的应用程序。If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the event. 导航器导航到第一条内容（、）后，导航到的每个内容将添加到导航历史记录中。After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (, ), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history. 如果需要保存有关要离开的内容的状态信息，可以通过将 设置为 对象，将状态添加到该内容的日记条目。If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting with a object. > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 以检测是否发出了用于刷新静态内容的请求，如果是，则取消请求。The following example shows how to handle to detect whether a request to refresh static content has been made and, if so, to cancel the request. 。. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigatingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigatingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigatingcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationFailed As NavigationFailedEventHandler

summary.span: 在导航到所请求内容出错时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在导航过程中引发 或 时，将引发 事件。When either a or an is thrown during a navigation, the event is raised. 向 传递了一个 ，它封装有关引发异常的异常和导航的详细信息。 is passed a that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception. 如果导航失败导致异常，且未处理，则会按列出的顺序引发以下事件：When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed: - 。. - 或 。 or . - 。. - 。. 如果导航器（、）由一个或多个导航器承载，则不会对任何导航器引发 `NavigationFailed`。If a navigator (, ) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationFailedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationfailedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationProgress As NavigationProgressEventHandler

summary.span: 在下载过程中定期发生，用于提供定位进度信息。

span.span: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 传递的 会公开以下进度信息： is passed a which exposes the following progress information: - 到目前为止下载的字节数（）。Number of bytes downloaded so far (). - 要下载的总字节数（）。Number of total bytes to download (). 每1024字节的下载内容会引发一次 ，并在剩余字节数不到1024字节后引发一次。 is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes. 出于此原因，处理 提供了一种有效的方法来跟踪和显示当前下载的进度。For this reason, handling provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download. 某些情况下不会引发 ，例如，导航到相同的内容片段，或在导航到当前加载的内容（即 属性的值）的内容片段。 won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the property). 导航到已编译的 XAML 资源时，可能不会引发最终的 事件。When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final event may not be raised. 这意味着，在下载结束时，最后报告的 值可能不等于 值。This means that at the end of the download, the last reported value may not equal the value. 处理导航完成后要通知的 事件。Handle the event to be notified when the navigation has finished. > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationProgressCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationprogresscode)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NavigationStopped As NavigationStoppedEventHandler

summary.span: 在调用 方法时发生，或者在当前导航正处于进行过程中时又请求一个新导航时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要在下载停止时发现有关导航请求的相关信息，请处理 。You handle if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped. 此信息可从传递到 事件处理程序的 对象中获得，其中包括：This information is available from the object that is passed to the event handler, and includes: - 请求的 URI。The requested URI. - 导航器（）。The navigator (, ). - 如果通过调用 或 启动导航，则为附加数据。Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either or . > [!NOTE] > 当 引发 时，它还会引发 对象上 事件。When raises , it also raises event on the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 。The following example shows how to handle . [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowNavigationStoppedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindownavigationstoppedcode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 重新加载当前内容。

span.span: Reloads the current content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果再次导航到当前内容（由 属性的值指定）， 不会再次下载内容。If the current content (specified by the value of the property) is navigated to again, does not download the content again. 若要强制 重新导航到内容，请调用 。To force to re-navigate to the content, call . 请注意，如果再次导航到当前内容，无论是通过调用 还是 ，都不会在导航历史记录中添加新条目。Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling or , a new entry is not added to navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry RemoveBackEntry() cil managed

summary.span: 移除后退历史记录中的最新日记条目。

span.span: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.

returns.span: 后退导航历史记录中的最新 （如果有）。

span.span: The most recent in back navigation history, if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个或更多导航器（、）共享相同的导航历史记录，则一个导航器可以使用 检索在另一个导航器中发生的导航的后退导航历史记录项。If two or more navigators (, ) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Source : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前内容的 URI，或当前正在导航到的新内容的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含当前内容的 URI 或当前正在导航到的内容。

span.span: A that contains the URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为与当前所显示的 URI 不同的 URI，导航器（、）将导航到指定的 URI。If you set this property to a different URI than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (, ) navigates to the specified URI. 如果取消了导航，则将 设置为从导航到的 URI 加载的内容。 is set to the content that is loaded from the URI that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled. 可以使用只包含片段的 URI 设置 ，并且可以将其设置为 `null`。 can be set with a fragment-only URI, and can be set to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StopLoading() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 停止为当前导航请求下载更多内容。

span.span: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 返回时立即调用，并停止正在子框架中进行的导航。 can be called as soon as returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames. ().(). 调用 方法将引发 事件。Calling the method raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 必须在启动导航的同一线程上调用 。 must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何停止加载。The following example demonstrates how to stop loading. [!code-csharp[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowstoploadingcode)] [!code-vb[NavigationServiceSnippets#MainWindowStopLoadingCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowstoploadingcode)]
